name: Sherlock Defi
description: Sherlock is the ultimate crypto detective! This powerful robot can uncover the hidden truths behind any crypto wallet address. It can show you everything from Opensea accounts and exchange activity to project creation, token minting, presale participation, airdrops and much more.Sherlock can help you identify wallets that frequently invest in up-and-coming projects, giving you valuable insights into which tokens may have the potential for huge gains.With Sherlock, you can easily identify wallets that frequently participate in presales and get in on the action early.
